title: Full Stack Engineer - Own Your Infrastructure
description:
Join our revolutionary NoOps engineering team where developers truly own everything from code to cloud!

We believe DevOps is a culture, not a role. That's why we've eliminated dedicated operations teams and empower our full-stack engineers to deploy and maintain their own services using modern developer-friendly tools.

What you'll do:
- Build amazing user experiences with React and Node.js
- Define infrastructure using AWS CDK (TypeScript)
- Deploy and monitor your own microservices
- Participate in on-call rotation for services you build
- Move fast and break things in true startup fashion
- Wear many hats and take ownership end-to-end

Requirements:
- 3+ years full-stack development experience
- Strong TypeScript/JavaScript skills
- Experience with React and Node.js
- AWS CDK or Pulumi knowledge preferred
- Startup mentality and willingness to learn
- No operations experience required - we'll teach you!

What we offer:
- Competitive salary (we'll discuss based on experience)
- Equity in a fast-growing startup
- Flexible hours (sometimes means working nights/weekends)
- Free snacks and ping pong table
- Move fast, ship often culture

We're looking for rockstar developers who can hit the ground running!
